body.name: Panasonic BK-3HCCA8BA eneloop pro AA High Capacity Ni-MH Pre-Charged Rechargeable Batteries, 8-Battery Pack
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs
features: EXTREMELY POWERFUL NiMH RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES: eneloop pro AA high capacity Ni-MH pre-charged rechargeable battery deliver up to 2500mAh typical, 2450mAh minimum
LONG LASTING PERFORMANCE: Recharge eneloop pro AA rechargeable batteries up to 500 times
PRE-CHARGED AND READY TO USE: eneloop pro AA rechargeable batteries are pre-charged at the factory using solar power and maintain up to 85% of their charge after 1 year (when not it use)
SECURE, PROTECTIVE PACKAGING: This package contains 8 eneloop pro AA rechargeable batteries
EXTREME TEMPERATURES: eneloop pro rechargeable batteries can used in extreme temperatures, down to -4 deg F.
QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: These eneloop pro rechargeable AA batteries are made in Japan and packaged in the United States

HUNDREDS OF HOUSEHOLD DEVICES: Perfect for use in hundreds of household devices, these eneloop pro AA rechargeable batteries can be used in remote flashlights, toys, digital camera flash units, game controllers and more
body.description: eneloop pro AA and AAA NiMH ready to use rechargeable batteries utilize Panasonic advanced rechargeable battery technology, allowing them to be recharged up to 500 times. eneloop AA and AAA rechargeable batteries deliver consistent extreme power performance, maintain 85% of their charge for up to 1 year (when not in use), come pre-charged by solar power (at the factory) and are ready to use out of the package. These eneloop batteries also feature extreme temperature performance down to -4 deg F. Pair eneloop and eneloop pro AA and AAA batteries with Panasonic advanced, quick advanced, or super quick advance eneloop or eneloop pro chargers to maximize your rechargeable battery experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: eneloop pro High Capacity Ni-MH rechargeable batteries utilize Panasonic’s advanced cell technology which delivers increased capacity for high drain devices (when unused and properly stored). eneloop batteries use a highly durable super lattice alloy which prolongs the life of the material. This improvement increases hydrogen stability resulting in reduced self discharge and long lasting, stable voltage output. eneloop and eneloop pro rechargeable batteries are pre-charged at the factory in Japan using power generated from solar energy. This process is certified by The Green Energy Certification Center. Keep your tactical flashlights, headlamps, walkie-talkie radios and other devices powered in the winter. eneloop and eneloop pro batteries deliver exceptional performance at extreme temps, down to –4 degree F.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Illuminating the Aurora Adventures!
reviews.reviewText: The Eneloop pro-AAA Rechargeable Batteries have become my trusted companions during thrilling aurora-chasing adventures in the dark Alaskan winters. These batteries power my Black Diamond Storm 450 headlamp, illuminating the path to mesmerizing Northern Lights displays.The reliability and reusability of the Eneloop pro batteries have turned mundane battery changes into a thing of the past. As I venture into the winter night, capturing the dance of the aurora borealis, these batteries consistently provide a steady and dependable power source for my essential gear.my headlamp is always ready to light up the Alaskan darkness, enhancing the enchanting experience of witnessing the vibrant colors of the aurora. Whether I'm navigating snowy trails or setting up my camera to capture the celestial spectacle, these batteries have proven themselves to be trustworthy allies in the heart of the winter wilderness.In conclusion, for fellow adventurers seeking a reliable power solution for their winter escapades, the Panasonic Eneloop pro AAA batteries are a must-have. Their rechargeable nature, dependability, and consistent performance make them an essential component of any aurora-hunting toolkit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Rechargeable Battery
reviews.reviewText: Ever since I started using Panasonic Eneloop rechargeable batteries I do not use any other brands either for my camera flashes or for various gadgets around the house. Their longevity is commendable. Bit over-priced, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent battery life
reviews.reviewText: I have this brand in everything in my house. I put them in and almost never seem to have to charge them. They have a long battery life and have been simply a great investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using these batteries for almost a decade
reviews.reviewText: Many years ago I wanted to go rechargeable for all my in house devices. I started with the white and black Eneloops. The Eneloops I have back from 2015 still are working in 2022. I've bought more over the years of course too. The black ones can charge 500 or so times, the white ones over 2,000 times. Now, if you charged a battery once a week, it would take 10 years to charge around 500 times. The black ones do have a bit more 'fuel in the tank', and are better for devices like cameras; but overall, the white ones have seemed basically just as good to me for most uses. And they are like half the cost. And they can be charged 4x more. So, decide what you want / need.Both the black and white versions work great. I use the black ones in more 'high demand' devices (flashlights, portable fan, etc.), and the white ones in less demanding devices (like remotes, mice/keyboards, etc.).Haven't had a single issue. I use their 4 port charger (model BQ-CC17). I have two of them that I got with 4 packs of batteries. So, I can easily charge 8 batteries in a few hours. Very easy to keep all my batteries topped up. I have one bin for full batteries, and one for empty; and I just charge them whenever I have time.I haven't bought one time use batteries in about a decade, and I don't plan to ever again. If you are thinking of going rechargeable, these are a great way to start. You get quality that will last, which is the point of going rechargeable in the first place. I have tried many other brands as well, most had issues over time. The Eneloops just keep on going. I will say the Amazon brand batteries have also been great. All have kept working for years and they hold a good long charge and seem good quality as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ENELOOP PRO | VR WMR controllers
reviews.reviewText: These ENELOOP PRO high capacity batteries are working great so far. I'm using these batteries with the Windows Mixed Reality ( WMR ) controllers & the Lenovo Explorer VR headset. I was playing VR for about 3 hrs & the battery dropped from 3.9 mA to about 3.7 mA & it only took me about 30 minutes to bring it back from 3.7 mA to 3.9 mA which is great! Sure beats waiting hours for older rechargeable batteries to charge back up again.Something you may want to know if using rechargeable batteries with WMR VR controllers.I had lower capacity SONY Cycle Energy Ni-MH AA 2000 mAh rechargeable batteries that I was using with my WMR controllers. I would let them charge for 7 hrs as instructed but whenever I tried to play my VR games the controllers would trigger an alert about the batteries being depleted within 30 minutes or less & would auto turn off haptic feedback in order to conserve battery power. Within less than an hour of use the controller would turn off & leave me scrambling for new batteries.I was under the impression that my rechargeable batteries were too weak or had gone bad so I purchased the ENELOOP PRO high capacity batteries as a replacement. After popping in the new batteries the problem persisted with the WMR controllers.Did a little research & discovered that WMR controllers are prone to false battery alerts & shutdowns when the internal & external battery contacts are dirty from small dust particles & finger oil residue. The battery clips that make contact with the controllers main-board needs to be carefully cleaned with a q-tip & a bit of 70% isopropyl rubbing alcohol.This requires the controller to be carefully disassembled so that the internal contacts which make contact between the battery clips & the main-board are properly cleaned. The isopropyl alcohol will remove fine dust particles & other debris to ensure solid contact while reducing power resistance which may lead towards false battery alerts.After going through that process, all my rechargeable batteries are working great. I confirmed that it's holding the charge with a basic multi-meter set to 1.5V ( 4.0 mA ).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great batteries--But About 1,5 yrs old when sold -
reviews.reviewText: While these are great batteries, they have been sitting around for 1.5 years according to dates on batteries.Instead of having at least a 70% charge (as advertised) they actually only had 50-54% charge.
